lyrics:
9 contributorskiss the girl lyricsintro
kiss the girl
kiss the girl

verse 1
there you see her
sitting there across the way
she dont got a lot to say
but theres something about her
and you dont know why but youre dying to try
you wanna kiss the girl
yes you want her
look at her you know ya do
its possible she wants you too
there is one way to ask her
it dont take a word not a single word
go on and kiss the girl kiss the girl

chorus
shalalalalala my oh my
looks like the boys too shy
aint gonna kiss the girl
shalalalalala aint that sad
its such a shame too bad

postchorus
youre gonna miss the girl
go on and kiss the girl kiss the girl
you might also likeverse 2
nows your moment
floating in a blue lagoon
boy you better do it soon
no time will be better
she dont say a word and she wont say a word
until you kiss the girl kiss the girl

chorus
shalalalalala my oh my
looks like the boys too shy
aint gonna kiss the girl
shalalalalala aint that sad
its such a shame too bad
youre gonna miss the girl
shalalalalala dont be scared
you better be prepared
go on and kiss the girl
shalalalalala dont stop now
dont try to hide it how
